perturbation.original_text: This PROMOTION AGREEMENT  (this "Agreement") is entered into as of May 31, 2019 (the "Effective Date") by and between SIGA TECHNOLOGIES, INC., a Delaware corporation having an address at 31 East 62nd Street, New York, NY 10065 ("SIGA"), and MERIDIAN MEDICAL TECHNOLOGIES, INC., a Pfizer company, and Delaware corporation having an address at 6350 Stevens Forest Road, Suite #301, Columbia, MD 21046 ("MMT"). SIGA and MMT are sometimes referred to individually as a "Party" and collectively as the "Parties".
perturbation.changed_text: This PROMOTION AGREEMENT  (this "Agreement") is entered into as of May 31, 2019 (the "Effective Date") by and between SIGA TECHNOLOGIES, INC., a Delaware corporation having an address at 31 East 62nd Street, New York, NY 10065 ("SIGA"), and MERIDIAN MEDICAL TECHNOLOGIES, INC., a Pfizer company, and Delaware corporation having an address at 6350 Stevens Forest Road, Suite #301, Columbia, MD 21046 ("Meridian"). perturbation.explanation: The change replaces 'MMT' with 'Meridian', creating confusion about which entity is being referred to in later sections, particularly concerning obligations assigned to 'MMT'.

perturbation.original_text: "MMT Promotion Personnel" any employees of MMT or its Affiliates and other approved Third Party contractors, agents and personnel and Permitted Sublicensees, that MMT will assign to conduct Promotion pursuant to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: "MMT Promotion Personnel" any employees of Meridian or its Affiliates and other approved Third Party contractors, agents and personnel and Permitted Sublicensees, that Meridian will assign to conduct Promotion pursuant to this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Replaces 'MMT' with 'Meridian' after first change in page 4 to create more confusion on the reader by referencing to two different names in this section.

perturbation.original_text: 9.1 Indemnification by SIGA.
